fields.name: Sockpuppet Account (Passive):
fields.value: You may submit two sets of votes during each Evening Phase. However, this passive is disabled if you ever win a round.

fields.name: Rig The Vote (1x, Charge 70%):
fields.value: Target any two different players during the Evening. Their scores will be swapped.

fields.name: Sneaky Peek (2x, Locked):
fields.value: This ability is unlocked if you place 3rd or 2nd in a round. Target a player to learn their true role, bypassing disguises. If it was unlocked previously, it will be re-locked if you win a round.
